name: Fall of Titan
description:
Defend your Titan from it's enemy. (Eventhough, you know this is it's last). 

"If I die, I die a legend" - Someone.

Shooter game mix with RTS element + ENDLESS. The game is still under heavy development. All element in the game are not comfirm yet. Any feedback are welcome.

FUTURE

- More RTS and Top Down 'feel' will be added.

PRESENT

-Balancing the gameplay (feedback).

NOTES: CONTAIN ADS
